page.title: 12THE AVENUES,1.
page.content: The housing of this area is of many different styles. Many of the houses are{Victorian}built in the early part of this century. People who have bought the houses have modernised them or restored them to their original style. Many of them are large houses with four or more bedrooms. The rooms are spacious and have high ceilings. Some are occupied by families, others are split up into flats for individual people. Many of the houses are student houses where people who are studying at{Hull} {University}live. {The Avenues,}as this area is known, is a conservation. There is a Resident's Association which has a committee that works to keep the area in a good state of repair. A resident pays 30p. a year to be a member.
